text: Emil Wojtaszek (27 August 1927 – 17 June 2017) was a Polish politician. He served as the minister of foreign affairs of the People's Republic of Poland from 1976 to 1980. He was a member of the Polish United Workers' Party. He was born in Kraków, Poland. Wojtaszek died on 17 June 2017 in Warsaw, aged 89.Emil Wojtaszek ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Politicians from Kraków
title: Emil Wojtaszek
